original_text: And the officers shall speak further unto the people, and they shall say, What man is there that is fearful and fainthearted? let him go and return unto his house, lest his brethren's heart faint as well as his heart.
korean_text: 책임자들은 또 백성에게 말하여 이르기를 두려워서 마음이 허약한 자가 있느냐 그는 집으로 돌아갈지니 그의 형제들의 마음도 그의 마음과 같이 낙심될까 하노라 하고

sentences.original_text: And the officers shall speak further unto the people,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 장관들은 백성에게 더 말할 것이니,

sentences.original_text: let him go and return unto his house,
sentences.korean_translation: 그에게 가서 자기 집으로 돌아가게 하라,
